# Extra: SARS-CoV-2 analysis

If you are dealing with SARS-Cov-2 data, then you can expand the analysis as follows...

```bash
pangolin {input} --outfile {output}
```

- `{input}` (all_consensus.fasta)
- `{output}` (pangolin.csv)
